definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The breakdown of the blood into hemosiderin has led to brownish staining of some of the cysts seen here.
sentences.chinese: 血管破壞出血形成的含血鐵黃素使一些包囊染成褐色。

sentences.english: An amoeba forms a cyst when conditions are unfavourable.
sentences.chinese: 當環境不利時，變形蟲產生包囊。

sentences.english: At the time, the universe was confined to a single point, encompassing all of the universe's matter.
sentences.chinese: 當時，宇宙只是一個奇點，包囊了宇宙中的所有物質。

sentences.english: In the experiment group, trophozoites were induced to transform to cysts gradually.
sentences.chinese: 實驗組中，滋養體逐漸向包囊轉變。

sentences.english: Cysts should be excised and sterilized to avoid ingestion by the definitive host .
sentences.chinese: 應該切除包囊並予以銷燬，以防止被最終宿主食入。

sentences.english: Objective The aim of this study was to measure morphological characteristic of Pneumocystis carinii cysts in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討大鼠卡氏肺孢子蟲包囊的形態學參數特徵。

sentences.english: Objective To study purification of cyst antigen (CAg) of Pneumocystis carinii .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究卡氏肺孢子蟲包囊抗原的純化方法。
